thread.title: DJ Mustard Announces "For Every 12 Hours" TIDAL Documentary
thread.title_full: DJ Mustard Announces "For Every 12 Hours" TIDAL Documentary

author: Victoria Hernandez
title: DJ Mustard Announces "For Every 12 Hours" TIDAL Documentary
text:
DJ Mustard Announces "For Every 12 Hours" TIDAL Documentary January 6, 2017 | 1:52 PM 0 
DJ Mustard gives fans a glimpse into his world with the release of the For Every 12 Hours documentary, due out January 13 on TIDAL. 
The film features exclusive interviews and performance footage of Mustard from the studio to the stage. Big Sean and Ty Dolla $ign help tell the story of the producer’s importance to the game. He not only toured with Rihanna to promote her Anti album, he also had a set at Coachella, HARD Summer and more. 
Fans in Los Angeles will have an opportunity to attend a special screening and Q&A with Mustard. 
And that’s not all. DJ Mustard also announced a residency at Las Vegas’ Marquee Nightclub. He will host events at The Cosmopolitan on January 7, January 23 and February 3. 
DJ Mustard released his second album, Cold Summer , last year and announced a reunion with YG . 
TIDAL members and non-members alike can watch the trailer for DJ Mustard’s For Every 12 Hours documentary above.
